_sText: MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL_V2 By LunarKirby And Whazaaaaa ------------------------------- Dedicated to SteamGamers ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is an All-In-One / Multimap for minigames, the map has 10 minigames, five made by LunarKirby and the other five by Whazaaaaa. Each map is based on skill of some sort, BHOP, SURF, Shooting etc. There are 64 spawns and the map has lighting with colours to create ambience. There are some custom textures in some map and some maps there are none. There are 3 musics that are chosen randomly at the start of a minigame. The minigames are: LunarKirby Climb Deathrun Race Slide Surf Whazaaaaa AwpBattle Bhop IceSkate KnifeFight ScoutBattle Authors Comment When we first started the map [August 2009] we were sure that we could make this and we did eventually, one thing we did not expect was it to take this long....... After one Year we finally managed to finish the map, the delay was not because of difficulty but with laziness.. yes, we are both very very lazy mappers. We worked on the map then we stopped then we worked on it again, alot of times. The main key that kept us going was the support of people, not really support, they kind of forced us to map. So this map took 1 year for us to make, and man we are so glad. -.- During the development of this map we ran into a problem, MAX_PLANE, yes our map had to many brush faces. The original map began with 10 maps like today, some odd minigames. Then one day I decided to add more minigames and the total went to 18. We finished all 18 maps compiled it all together and boom, we hit the error. So we made a plan to Split the map into two, one map with skill minigames and the other with fun minigames, named. MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL And MG_SG_ALLINONE_FUN So we did that and here we are the release if the first Half, SKILL. We'll release the other half next time, proberly taking another 1 or 2 years. Thank you for downloading our map [if you do...] And hey dood, i know, tl;dr. Map Properties Name: MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL Type: MG - Multimap / All-In-One Size: 45Mb Content: 10 Minigames Custom Textures Music Awesome Themes and designs PLEASE DOWNLOAD PLEASE PLAY PLEASE COMMENT THANK YOU ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- MG_SG_ALINONE_SKILL_V2 Made by [SG] LunarKirby [SG-A] Whazaaaaa www.SteamGamers.com Minigame IP: 72.26.196.164:27015 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- THIS MAP TOOK 1 YEAR OMFG
